note: A human being 🤷‍♂️ (he/him) with its singularity. Interested in ecology 💚, free software 👨‍💻, psychology 🤯, foxes 🦊, cats 😻, the Celtic culture ☘️, music 🎶 (non-exhaustive list lol). I'm a sysadmin working on a new cooperative project. I talk mostly in French, sometimes in English. I live in Brittany/Bretagne/Bertègn/Breizh (and I'm very proud of it!) but I consider myself a citizen of planet Earth 🌍💙
